page.title: 07Placket Wood Walk
page.content: Placket Wood Walk is situated in Placket Coppice which is part of Wilmington Forest. It was opened in l979 after combined planning by the Forestry Commission and the East Sussex Associations for the Disabled and Blind. It has wide paths and no steep slopes so that disabled walkers and people in wheel-chairs are able to enjoy the woodland flora and fauna. Information boards are sited at appropriate points and picnic tables and chairs are provided. There is a public car park and toilets.
